title: SF_TwoHandControlTypeIII (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SF_TwoHandControlTypeIII EXTENDS
SF_TwoHandControlTypeII
This function block provides the two-hand control functionality for type III A, B and C.
The difference is in the input processing of the switches (single contact, 2 switches per input (equivalent), 2 switches per input (antivalent). (see EN 574, Section 4 Type III. Fixed specified time difference is 500 ms).

rows:
Input of button 1, FALSE: Button 1 released, TRUE: Button 1
actuated.

Input of button 2, FALSE: Button 2 released, TRUE: Button 2
actuated.

rows.Name: Ready
rows.Comment:
Activation of the FB. TRUE indicates that the FB is
activated and the outputs results are valid, FALSE the FB is
not active and the program is not executed.

rows:
Safety related output signal. FALSE: No correct two hand
operation. TRUE: S_Button1 and S_Button2 inputs are TRUE and
no error occurred. Correct two hand operation.

Output indicating that the FB is active and the primary
safety function is demanded (e.g. related to the safety
functionality).
